name: 薪酬設計與績效管理
description: 本課程旨在讓同學們了解如何設計與執行高效能績效管理流程以及具激勵效用之薪酬制度設計，以利組織提升員工生產力與組織競爭力。核心議題如下：(1)績效管理架構；(2)績效管理流程；(3)績效溝通與回饋；(4)薪酬結構與設計；(5)職位評價；(6)績效導向薪酬計畫；(7)員工福利制度。
goals: 以宏觀角度審視企業經營面臨的挑戰
了解績效管理與薪酬管理的相關方法論
具備解決企業績效管理與薪資獎酬議題的能力
syllabus:
Week 1: Total Rewards (Introduction)  
Week 2: Pay Design (Design a pay structure)  
Week 3: Remuneration Surveys (Analyze Survey Data)  
Week 4: Incentive and Performance Pay Plans (Incentives and Pay for Performance in the Workplace)  
Week 5: Employee Benefits (The Cost and Value of Employee Perks)  
Week 6: Work-Life Balance (WLB) Programs (Definitions, Causes, and Consequences)  
Week 7: Payroll Administration (Global Payroll Operations)  
Week 8: Guest Speaking (Payroll Compliance)  
Week 9: Midterm Exam  
Week 10: Job Performance Management Framework (Task and Contextual Performance)  
Week 11: Performance Planning (OKRs vs. MBO vs. KPIs)  
Week 12: Performance Monitoring (Check-in with CFRs)  
Week 13: Performance Appraisal (Getting rid of?)  
Week 14: Performance Development (IDP and PIP)  
Week 15: Guest Speaking (Eliminating performance rating?)  
Week 16: Final Exam  
Week 17: Self-directed learning I  
Week 18: Self-directed learning II

註: 所有作業都在課堂中進行，請同學自行攜帶筆電上課，以利作業繳交與簡報。教材與作業/討論，將在Formosasoft完成，並用中文真名登錄並完成分組。
